orgverse:
धर्मज्ञः श्रेष्ठमायान्तं स्वगृहं प्रति शासनात्।
आतिथ्यं गृहमाजग्मुस्तद्राज्येन सुसाधुना॥
translation: The learned and righteous sage Vishvamitra, on his arrival at his home, was treated with great respect by the king, as was suitable, and the hospitality offered to him was very commendable.
